mapper.select: select algorithm.algorithm_id,parameter_scheme.scheme_id,parameter.parameter_id, scheme_name,scheme_description,scheme_remark,algorithm_name,parameter_name, parameter_input_value,parameter_option_value from parameter_scheme left join parameter on parameter.algorithm_id=parameter_scheme.algorithm_id left join parameter_scheme_value on parameter_scheme_value.scheme_id=parameter_scheme.scheme_id and parameter_scheme_value.parameter_id=parameter.parameter_id left join algorithm on parameter.algorithm_id=algorithm.algorithm_id

select algorithm.algorithm_id,parameter_scheme.scheme_id, parameter.parameter_id,scheme_name,scheme_description, scheme_remark,algorithm_name,parameter_name,parameter_input_value, parameter_option_value,parameter_type,available_datasets from parameter_scheme left join parameter on parameter.algorithm_id=parameter_scheme.algorithm_id left join parameter_scheme_value on parameter_scheme_value.scheme_id=parameter_scheme.scheme_id and parameter_scheme_value.parameter_id=parameter.parameter_id left join algorithm on parameter_scheme.algorithm_id=algorithm.algorithm_id where parameter_scheme.scheme_id=#{schemeId}
mapper.insert: insert into parameter_scheme (algorithm_id, scheme_name, scheme_description, scheme_remark) values ( #{algorithmId}, #{schemeName}, #{schemeDescription}, #{schemeRemark} )
mapper.update: update parameter_scheme set scheme_name = #{schemeName}, scheme_description = #{schemeDescription}, scheme_remark = #{schemeRemark} where scheme_id = #{schemeId}

choose.when: insert into parameter_scheme_value (scheme_id, parameter_id, parameter_input_value, parameter_option_value) values (#{schemeId},#{item.parameterId},'null','null');
insert into parameter_scheme_value (scheme_id, parameter_id, parameter_input_value, parameter_option_value) values (#{schemeId},#{item.parameterId},'null','null');
choose.otherwise: insert into parameter_scheme_value (scheme_id, parameter_id, parameter_input_value, parameter_option_value) values (#{schemeId},#{item.parameterId},'null','null');

mapper.select: select distinct parameter_scheme.scheme_id from parameter_scheme where parameter_scheme.algorithm_id=#{algorithmId}
mapper.insert: insert into parameter_scheme_value (scheme_id, parameter_id, parameter_input_value, parameter_option_value) values (#{schemeId},(select max(parameter_id) from parameter),'null','null');
